Text: FYI: This is a scanned copy of the physical book, not the e-book version. Also, all I got was 53 pages but the actual book runs 352 pages. Not the real deal. But, thanks anyway for the upload.
Yes, I scanned just the beginning because I'd never seen this book for downloading anywhere and I thought it had too much valuable information not to share.

BEWARE:

This is not even "the beginning" of the book...this is photocopied pages of chapter 2 and chapter 3...and then a bunch of economic charts.

If anyone can get a full version (pdf, ebook, audiobook...anything), please post link here.
